string.value: You can earn the #b<Sleepywood Explorer>#k title by exploring Sleepywood.
#b#eTitle - Sleepywood Explorer#k#n\r\nExplore the 10 main regions of Sleepywood.\r\n#bâ— Status : #R27019# / 10 Completed.
You have earned the #b<Sleepywood Explorer>#k title for exploring various places in Sleepywood.
You've finished exploring Sleepywood. I will grant you the #b<Sleepywood Explorer>#k title.

How did you like exploring Sleepywood? It is known to be a dangerous underground area, where many Maple warriors go for a challenge. You should be proud of yourself for having fully explored a place so difficult. For that, I will gladly grant you the #b<Sleepywood Explorer>#k title. Keep up the good work as you explore other parts of Maple World!
You haven't finished exploring. Come back and see me after you've explored every inch of El Nath Mts.
